about.summary: Provides utilities to create or suppress start-up messages.
Provides utilities to create or suppress start-up messages.

name: r-startupmsg
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.0.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-startupmsg
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/startupmsg_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/startupmsg/startupmsg_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 7bd62011f4f94f46c33f219b584ce7baa9c6b00e3a40f18e042b18ca5d7edc1b

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('startupmsg')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('startupmsg')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=startupmsg
  license: LGPL-3.0-only
  summary: Provides utilities to create or suppress start-up messages.
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/LGPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: startupmsg
# Encoding: latin1
# Version: 0.9.6
# Date: 2019-03-11
# Title: Utilities for Start-Up Messages
# Description: Provides utilities to create or suppress start-up messages.
# Authors@R: person("Peter", "Ruckdeschel", role=c("cre", "cph", "aut"), email="peter.ruckdeschel@uni-oldenburg.de")
# Depends: R(>= 1.8.0)
# ByteCompile: yes
# License: LGPL-3
